title: Portfolio
expDescription: My first web designer portfolio. I learned a lot from making it, I got to practice color-theory, proper layouts, JSON files, and hosting with github.
reference: Photo by Anas Alshanti on Unsplash

title: Trading Bot
description: Binance trading bot and backtest environment
expDescription: Binance trading bot and backtest environment. This project so far includes a basic moving-average strategy and a backtest environment, it was written in python using Pandas for data-analysis.
reference: Photo by Shahadat Rahman on Unsplash

title: Trading Journal
description: An ongoing personal project which lead me down the web development path
expDescription: An ongoing personal project which lead me down the web development path. This project is what made me start web development, and I have learned extensive amounts during the making of it. It made me step far out of my comfort zone and challenge myself with tech I have never touched before.
reference: Photo by Dariusz Sankowski on Unsplash
